page.title: 08B.N. COMMUNITY GROUPS
page.content: BUCKLAND NEWTON W.I. is held in the village hall every first Wednesday of the month. 23 members attend it but they are hoping to get the membership up to 30.They meet once a month.They always have a speaker or a slides show. They quite often have an open discussion. At the meetings they have tea and biscuits. They also have games and quizzes. At Christmas they have a party. The function of the W.I. is to enable women to make friends and learn new skills. ************************************** ************************************** KARATE CLUB :The Karate Club is held on Thursdays at Buckland Newton village hall at 7.00-9.00pm. It costs 50p per meeting.
